create.hero-desc: Select a domain or industry, choose relevant internal and external factors, and let CRAFTER 2.0 generate a structured persona for your research needs.
create.domain-desc: Select the domain or industry for the persona you want to create.
create.domain-add-suggestion: Add "{query}" as a new domain if not listed.
create.internal-desc: Select available internal factors. Edit the description as a list of items.
create.internal-reset-dialog-desc: This will revert descriptions of selected internal attributes to their defaults. Selection remains unchanged.
create.internal-details-empty: Select a factor from the middle list to edit details.
create.external-desc: Select available external factors. Edit the description as a list of items.
create.external-reset-dialog-desc: This will revert descriptions of selected external attributes to their defaults. Selection remains unchanged.
create.external-details-empty: Select a factor from the middle list to edit details.
create.additional-details-desc: Specific aspects you want to focus on (optional).
create.additional-details-placeholder: Example: Focus on users with visual impairments, or users with minimal technology experience...
create.content-length-desc: Adjust the length of the generated persona description
create.content-length-warning: If there are too many human factors, the response length can be not what you want
create.content-length-helper-desc: The length of the persona determines the details shown: short for quick ideas, medium for balance, long for in-depth analysis.
create.content-length-short-helper: Suitable for brainstorming; contains essentials like demographics, main goal, and 1-2 pain points.
create.content-length-medium-helper: Balanced for workshops; includes motivation, several goals, pain points, and interaction with technology.
create.content-length-long-helper: In-depth; adds personal stories, domain context, and more complete human factors.
create.content-length-custom-helper: Users can set the word count as needed.
